resources.string: CREATE TABLE USERINFO(ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, user_id TEXT NOT NULL, email_id TEXT NOT NULL ,user_pwd TEXT NOT NULL ); \n CREATE TABLE EVENT_CALENDAR(ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, EVENT_TITLE TEXT NOT NULL, START_DATE TEXT NOT NULL ); \n
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS USERINFO; \n DROP TABLE IF EXISTS EVENT_CALENDAR; \n
